website_summaries.verdict: A bargain buy - 90 capsules for around $6. Supports nervous system and heart health, and promotes a sense of well-being.
pros: The B vitamins included in these tablets can help in bettering mood, increasing energy, and supporting nervous system health and circulation
Can take one or two pills per day
Trusted brand free of gluten, soy, artificial colors, and flavors
Users say they feel a difference in energy and mood, and the pills are easy to swallow
cons: Does not contain all B vitamins

customer_reviews.title: Look closely; this "B-Complex" does NOT include vitamin B9 (folate)
customer_reviews.text: This product really seems to represent itself as a complete set of B vitamins, but in fact it lacks folate / folic acid / vitamin B9. I realize that I should have looked closer before buying, but it was a day full of brain fog and I mistakenly trusted "B-complex" to contain all of the eight B vitamins. By the time I realized my mistake, the package was open, so a return won't be possible. I hope this review will prevent someone from making the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: S J L

customer_reviews.title: I knew exactly what I was getting and I was happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: They arrive on time. My expiration date was fine (Dec2020). I already take Hair skin and nail supplements with folate and biotin so this was exactly what I wanted. The pills are small and I didn't have upset stomach or bad flushing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this many times and take one pill every evening. It prevents me from having to clear my throat constantly, as I had to do continuously in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Some days I seem to drag through my day so ...
customer_reviews.text: Some days I seem to drag through my day so it is those times I reach for my B-Complex and it really does give me some extra energy. I also give it to my husband as he is a diabetic and his one medication he takes depletes the body of B-12.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Banta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great dose, price and quality! Thanks again Amazon and Puritan's Pride!
customer_reviews.author: Me 😉

customer_reviews.title: B vitamins are B vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Good price, smell like a vitamin store, but they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: terri b

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the tummy
customer_reviews.text: Finally a B-complex that doesn't irritate my stomach! I started taking this postpartum with my nursing twins. I can tell when I skip it as my energy is lower that day and I feel stress more.
customer_reviews.author: FourBoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price for quantity, good consumer report review of company and product consistency
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, expiration date is very short. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a negative review for this. I bought two bottles; each having 180 tablets purchased on January 17, 2019 with expiration date 03/19 (March 2019) and cannot return them either. Have I known the expiration date, I would have never bought any bottles from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Dhillon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't make me feel sick!
customer_reviews.text: Most b complexes make me sick to my stomach. Not this one! My energy levels have increased dramatically. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product a a great price. I will continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price!!!!! Product was just as described
customer_reviews.author: WorrleyD

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel it works as well as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: hazel h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fresh and pills are small and easy to swallow. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Roderick

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. Very low doses of mg
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Camargo

customer_reviews.title: A great vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best B complex vitamins I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: I thought I got a good deal UNTIL I GOT THEM
customer_reviews.text: I thought I got a good deal UNTIL I GOT THEM. LITTLE TABLETS THE SIZE OF BABY ASPRIN. WHAT A JOKE I'D HAVE TO TAKE 10 TO MATCH THE ONES I BUY AT WALMART***** DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY...........
customer_reviews.author: DON K

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I usually take B-complex supplement to combat my acne probe oily skin and after purchasing this particular one (Puritan's Pride Vitamin B-Complex And Vitamin B-12) n religiously taking it everyday..somehow my skin's oiliness didn't improve at all which is weird cos' usually B-complex helps me a lot in that case...and realized that this one doesn't contain B-6!!!!!! that's bummer!!!! I expected that b-6 included since it's B-complex...but not this one..So I found another B-complex which contains B-6 and immediately my skin got better!! so I'kl never buy this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: navichan

customer_reviews.title: FLAVOR?
customer_reviews.text: This is good source of your B vitamins ( but FLAVOR ) NO WAY, these tablets smell and taste just like you would think vitamins would taste. BUT, that just means that these are the Real Deal. I have been taking them for years ( 62 yro ) but when the quality goes down ( which I will be able to feel ) I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Normal Person

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Before I started taking these, I had tingling in my head and other parts of my body. Once I started taking these I started to notice immediate results. Now I've been taking them for about a month and I have not experienced any tingling sensations around my body. great product!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Energy !
customer_reviews.text: This supplement has been as good if not better then the more expensive ones I have purchased !
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Mama-Melanie Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: b-12
customer_reviews.text: Easy, they dissolve in your mouth with a nice cherry flavor
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice small tablets of B complex.
customer_reviews.text: Small tablets with a good amount for B daily support.
customer_reviews.author: Re Viewer

customer_reviews.title: I have always bought B Complex but getting older the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought B Complex but getting older the B-12 was an extra bonus. I would definitely buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. I have more confidence in the Puritan Pride product.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price, seems to be good quality. Much lower price than local stores. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for stress. I can feel the difference when I take it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony BW.

product_meta.title: Puritans Pride Vitamin B-Complex and Vitamin B-12, 180 Count
product_meta.description: Style:Vitamin B ComplexSupports heart health and circulation. Helps maintain nervous system health. Involved in energy metabolism.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
